Supports iOS 9.0 to 11.1.2 I think

BETA Tweak: Use at your own risk

Depends on IamNoGenius

Enables the built-in lyrics for Spotify. Native implementation. Enables for every track, even those without lyrics. Works best with IamNoGenius installed (included as a dependency for now). Works on Spotify 8.4.23 (latest as of Mar 10 2018).
